entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi generates bad server list (no domain), breaking Swagger and Scalar #61252
  • Store "Configure Multiple Startup Projects" settings on the SLN file itself #61250
  • Perf improvement: https #61248
  • Kestrel's ParseHeaders throws an ArgumentOutOfRange exception on certain headers #61245

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #61243
  • [OpenAPI] error CS0308: The non-generic type 'TypeName' cannot be used with type arguments #61035
  • perf: default registered DataProtection works slower on linux compared to windows #59287
  • Response compression not working #61205
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorWebInteractiveServer #61236
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-generation, json, json #61237

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Copy Constructor for JsonSerializerSettings #61251
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Build projects that consume tool shims in pass 2 #61249
    area-infrastructure
  • Add InvokeNew, GetValue & SetValue to JS interop API #61246
    area-blazor
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25180.3 #61244
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Harden handling for generic type arguments in source generator #61145
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • feat: fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HasAlternateKey not generated for principal entity when referenced via HasPrincipalKey #35879
  • Unexpected behavior of split query with non-trivial projection #35878
  • Support structs in DbContext.Database.SqlQuery<T>() #35877

Closed

  • React to deps.json change wrt PrivateAssets #35265
    10.0.0
  • Automatically build entities from FromSqlRaw #35876

PullRequests

Updated

  • Cosmos Full Text Search support #35868
  • Fix to #35299 - EF Core InMemory database throws an argument exception on Nullable<>.ToString #35763
  • Support accessing members of a conditional value #35390
    community-contribution
  • Fix casted collections of enums as primitive collections. #35839

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps.Map crashes example app #28718
  • Microsoft team deadlock MAUI, MSAL, WebView2 #28717
  • [.NET10]I9-Scroll mode "KeepLastItemInView" does not keep the last item at the end of the displayed list when adding new items. #28716
    .NET 10.0-preview4

Closed

  • [Android][iOS] Page doesn't function properly when loaded into WebView #21969
  • iOS: button won't expand vertically to fit long text when LineBreakMode="WordWrap" #22054
  • Application won't run #28543

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2

Merged

  • [ci] try publish the zip #28719
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • [NET10] Add global resources and configuration method #28649
    area-xaml, area-core-hosting, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Stop iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation by looking at VisualElement computed Constraint #28479
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix iOS CollectionView not reacting properly to orientation changes #28670
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] CV2 ItemsLayout update #28675
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • [xamlc] convert {OnPlatform} to OnPlatformExtension<T> #28700
  • [iOS] Inherit AccessibilityTraits for views wrapped inside a WrapperView #27088
    platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-general, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix to wrong CancellationToken on IStreamImageSource.GetStreamAsync #28685
    community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [iOS] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Android - Essentials Geolocation | Added support for MslAltitudeMeters #27579
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Fixed ListView leak caused by not disposed ContextActionsCell #28702
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • [iOS] Fix Crash When Using FlyoutItem with DataTemplate and Binding #28683
    area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] CV RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand fires on initial data load - fix #28321
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need an API to get the collection 'element/iteration' type #77926
  • Unskip DoNotCopyValueTests #77925
  • Update 'use collection expr' fixer to support key-value-pairs/dictionaries. #77922
  • Block Insert (Alt-LeftMouse) does not work properly #77917
  • Source generator-filled partial method "go to definition" and "go to implementation" seem reversed #77916

Closed

  • Add documentation for TypeDefinitionDocument custom debug information #73816
    17.13
  • Unavailble link to Portable PDB v1.0: Format Specification #77910

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for 'with()' element when converting code to a collection expr #77928
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix EA layering for Razor.ExternalAccess #77927
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: disallow collection arguments for `[CollectionBuilder]` types #77924
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: update feature status #77923
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update null-conditional assignment feature status #77921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce main thread switches in VisualStudioProjectFactory.CreateAndAddToWorkspaceAsync #77920
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid computations in AnalyzerAssemblyLoader.AddDependencyLocation #77919
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Make frozen doc state non-nullable #77896
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Simplify the code for getting source generator diagnostics into the diagnostics service. #77898
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, Next
  • Razor EA: load from ServiceHubCore #77720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Allow the new Razor project to access protocol types #77912
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Feedback from analyzer loading change #77780
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Dictionary expressions: remove PROTOTYPE comments #77876
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77915
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the link to the file Portable PDB v1.0: Format Specification #77911
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Dictionary expressions: support user-defined and dynamic conversions for expression and spread elements for dictionary target types #77860
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove richnav pipeline and package #77902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77835
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.12-telmet] Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type #77899
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: all diag analyzer work. #77881
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Detect regular method vs. operator mismatch during overriding and interface implementation #77885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Factory methods to create immutable dictionary instances from dictionary expressions #114090
  • [API Proposal]: NativeTensor<T> #114089
  • PackedSimd fails to find interpreter intrinsic #114088
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel Open Telemetry extension APIs #114084
  • Expression.TryFault returns incorrect result with return labels #114081
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.*{Hex/Base64}*(utf8) #114079
  • Performance discrepancy: Collection Expressions vs. LINQ Extension Methods #114074
  • Assertion failed 'compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(InstructionSet_SSSE3)' during 'Importation' #114072
  • Runtime projects aren't using the live portable RID graph in the build #114069
  • ClassUnloadStarted callback of ICorProfilerCallback is not called for generic class instances in different LoaderAllocator #114068
    10.0.0
  • 标题: [Bug][Linux][net8.0] Proxy CONNECT fails (407) using HTTPS_PROXY env var with credentials; No Proxy-Authorization header sent #114066
  • Covariant returns are devirtualized for interfaces but not for base classes #114065
    Future
  • [Mono]: Rare deadlock when pre-emptive suspend a thread holding look inside pthread library on Android. #114064
  • [API Proposal]: Add RSA-PSS signature validation with custom salt length OR expose RsaBcryptSafeHandle #114061
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester.cmd #114055
  • System.Text.Json should support has buildin support read json number to string property #114054

Closed

  • JIT: Assertion failed 'InlineeCompiler->fgFirstBB->bbWeight == 0' during 'Morph - Inlining' #114073
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add logging APIs to System.ClientModel #111046
  • `ReaderWriterLockSlim.WaitingWriteCount` returns 0 if the write lock is entering as an upgrade from `UpgradableReadLock` #107077
    10.0.0
  • New hard crash after targeting .net 9 from 8 (System.AccessViolationException) #110543
  • Segmentation fault running System.Security.Cryptography.Tests #113785
    10.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.3.25168.9] Autodesk Revit 2025 close unexpectedly after closing File > Options window #113751
  • [API Proposal]: add a flexible/polymorphic alternative of FromKeyedServicesAttribute for Controller factory #114014
  • JIT: Switch should create assertions #113992
    10.0.0
  • CreateAppHost task fails with very long path #39211
  • Moving target framework parsing to runtime #39885
  • Lack of runtime judgment error #41203
  • Exception thrown (but caught) when reading ExpandoObject property; affects performance #41873
  • How to get metadatatoken from address of MethodDesc. #114053

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][interpreter] Make nint and nuint work for interpreter simd intrinsics #114087
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • ML-KEM: PKCS#8 Import #114086
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cDAC] Support passing global string values #114085
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • HTTP/3: Eliminate near-zero "wait for connection" telemetry signals #114083
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [TEST] Async2 with variants turned off #114082
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-async
  • [browser] profilers linking and instrumentation in AOT #114080
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114078
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114077
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114075
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [S.T.J] Removed unused field in JsonProperty #114071
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm][interp] Try out a few more matches for the intrinsics #114070
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add support for `.vtfixup` in ILC #114067
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SLH-DSA implementation for OpenSSL #114060
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • TypeDefinitionDocument documentation #103135
    area-Meta
  • Followon changes from code review comments in the Monitor HMF removal change #113857
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Fix improperly contained BroadcastScalarToVector(CreateScalar(GT_LONG)) #113994
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Always set block weight during method entry canonicalization #114076
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ML-KEM: Contract Tests #114051
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Include in WaitingWriteCount the thread that may be waiting in upgradable mode #113982
    area-System.Threading
  • [RISC-V] Fix Windows build #114062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove dead code #113852
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixed some typos in the document: Implementation of Hardware Intrinsics in CoreCLR #113228
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #113975
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono] Missing memory barrier leads to crash in multi-threaded scenarios #113740
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.5
  • Fix propagating of unhandled exception to native caller #113980
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Enable more constant foldings for switch ops using assertions #113998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix EH and stack walking on linux-x86 #113972
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Test failure - SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 #113648
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Make COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS Allowable After Attach and non immutable #113924
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove reference / redistribution of externally provided packages in MSBuild tasks #113404
    area-Build-mono
  • Draft : Reduce TP regression in allocateRegistersMinimal() #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TypeMap API (Dynamic implementation) #113954
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Stackwalk support for interpreted frames #113900
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Sign and harden pkgs #114027
    needs-area-label
  • Reimplement PR 112032, preserve trailing extra data when updating ZIP files #113306
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Improve error handling of unknown arch #114046
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ZipArchive loop condition for reading central directory headers #114023
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Remove superfluous modifiers from contract interfaces #113983
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • remove the switch to fallback to old EH #114018
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Fix R2R files doublemap on UNIX #113082
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Propagate flow into finally regions correctly in synthesis #114016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enhance logging of stubs through the PerfMap on Linux #113943
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Replace `Unsafe.As` with `Unsafe.Read{Write}Unaligned` #113293
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Increase `runtime-coreclr libraries-pgo` timeout #113942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Parallel change to the diagnostic update for GC Info decoder. #113888
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] event pipe - JavaScript part #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Add field access support to CoreCLR Interpreter #114049
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: Shrink data for scalar instructions with contained const vectors #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix crossgen2 sometimes emitting tokens from the wrong module into R2R output #114029
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make lttng-ust an optional dependency. #113876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Simple math intrinsics #113689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Allow using ldsflda on initonly fields outside of cctor #112081
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Cleanup some unused code and signature #112905
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix build with enabled FEATURE_ENABLE_NO_ADDRESS_SPACE_RANDOMIZATION #112689
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Fix syslog format error on Windows. #114009
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Apple mobile] Enable trimming on build machines to match ILLink features #113466
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.x
  • [mono] [hotreload] Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #113995
    area-EnC-mono
  • Deduplicate base interfaces from another assembly in COM generator #111931
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Adjust additional source under utilcode and vm to use minipal_log API. #113916
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete OSX libmsquic transport nuget package #111557
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Don't use `Delegate.Method` in ServiceDescriptor #114008
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.165, windows: 135.0.7049.41 #114042
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Document important nuances about Dictionary/HashSet #112760
    area-System.Collections

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Use prototype roslyn compiler #3062

Merged

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Implement Swift native handle as `SafeHandle` #3052

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet pack on maccatalyst with Release config misconfigures search path for files #48041
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe, Version=6.0.1.0 on Framework leg #48036
  • Saving disk space by not copying transitive project references in libraries without transitive project references. #48035
  • Test templates: Don't add TestingPlatformDotnetTestSupport if user specifies MTP in dotnet.config #48031
  • (Immutable) collection properties break value based equality in records #48027

Closed

  • Support package@version syntax in `dotnet package add` #47981
  • Missing VS.Redist.* packages from SDK build #47950
  • Method 'System.IO.Directory.GetParent' not found in Microsoft.PackageDependencyResolution.targets #1967
    Backlog
  • Should DisplayVSMessage condition read from NETCoreAppMaximumVersion instead of UnsupportedTargetFrameworkVersion #44839

PullRequests

Created

  • Added 30 to the width and X location to make sure there is room for the progress label #48043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Adjust namespaces to match folder layout #48042
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update baseline for VS redist assets #48040
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only set DotnetTool package type if no package type is set #48039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only publish FSharp packages when needed #48033
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in GeneratePackagePruneData #48030
    untriaged
  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • allow @ syntax for package versions in package add #47961
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update baseline and split comparison report #48037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #48025
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: "Use primary constructor" #47998
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Flow TargetArchitecture and TargetOS to inner repos #48024
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [SBRP Usage Report] Add target pack support and scan project.assets.json files for package downloads #47916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix buildArchitecture -> targetArchitecture renames in YML #48032
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make version identification slightly better #47987
    untriaged
  • Open Test1.cs in Visual Studio, not MSTestSettings.cs #47768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use TargetArchitecture and TargetRid properties #47977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes #44839 to unblock runtime when changes TFMs #47960
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • dotnet CLI: More cleanup via VS tools #47995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Installer job should fail if tests have failed #48015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make it possible to prep other RIDs and architectures #47956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make all the properties in StaticWebAssetEndpoint lazy #47833
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Improve Post-Build Signing Validation in the VMR #47744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #47904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve MTP dotnet test exit code messages #47979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
